fields.subject: C. Bratton refused wt x 2 weeks
fields.message_body: C. Bratton refused wt x 2 weeks. Nurse reports cognitive decline and increased irritability. Resident with h/o poor appetite. Intakes between 50-75%. Weight appears to be declining with 8.7# wt loss noted since admission 11/15. Resident states he is 'lonely, angry and bored and wants to leave'. Nurse and SW notified. Encouraged dining room for meals and resident agreed to add snacks between meals and a milkshake after dinner. Rec. check PAB, B12, and 25(OH)D and psych consult.

fields.subject: Current weights needed
fields.message_body: C. Bratton refused wt x 2 weeks. Lapin-Vance was in PT and agreed to be weighed when CNA arrives.
